backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no exposed functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing routing behavior for root and /policy paths and listing related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, PolicyPage, index.css, and index.html.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style overrides defining extensive OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining SPA root element, base href, metadata, and script loader for main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router to redirect '/' to '/policy' and handles unknown routes by redirecting to the policy page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity context provider and hook managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme with amber/orange palette, accessibility enhancements, smooth scrolling, and typography improvements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that initializes React, wraps the app in query and identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/PolicyPage.tsx: Large Privacy Policy page with header, table of contents, scroll navigation, and multiple detailed policy sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, listing implemented features and pending requests for building and deploying a policy page.
